text: Ara tomara jene rakha ye, tomadera madhye allahara rasula rayechena; tini bahu bisaye tomadera katha sunale tomara'i kasta pete. Kintu allaha tomadera kache imanake priya karechena ebam setake tomadera hrdayagrahi karechena. Ara kuphari, papacara o abadhyatake karechena tomadera kache apraiya. Tara'i to satya pathapraapta
